item.title: [JDK-8342765] [21u] RTM tests assume UnlockExperimentalVMOptions is disabled by default
item.description:
Distros with Graal integration will have `UnlockExperimentalVMOptions` enabled, causing several RTM tests to fail:

compiler/rtm/cli/TestRTMAbortThresholdOption.java
compiler/rtm/cli/TestRTMLockingCalculationDelayOption.java
compiler/rtm/cli/TestRTMLockingThresholdOption.java
compiler/rtm/cli/TestRTMSpinLoopCountOption.java
compiler/rtm/cli/TestUseRTMForStackLocksOptionOnUnsupportedConfig.java
compiler/rtm/cli/TestUseRTMXendForLockBusyOption.java

Note that this directory of tests was removed by https://bugs.openjdk.org/browse/JDK-8329141 as part of JDK24.
item.summary: [21u] RTM tests assume UnlockExperimentalVMOptions is disabled by default

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment:
Changeset: c3cb940f
Branch: master
Author: Todd V. Jonker <jonker@amazon.com>
Committer: Paul Hohensee <phh@openjdk.org>
Date: 2024-10-30 16:25:06 +0000
URL: https://git.openjdk.org/jdk21u/commit/c3cb940f4f7125e8c8695d360a343da10f1ffde4

Changeset: c3cb940f
Branch: master
Author: Todd V. Jonker <jonker@amazon.com>
Committer: Paul Hohensee <phh@openjdk.org>
Date: 2024-10-30 16:25:06 +0000
URL: https://git.openjdk.org/jdk21u-dev/commit/c3cb940f4f7125e8c8695d360a343da10f1ffde4

[jdk21u-fix-request] Approval Request from Todd V. Jonker
This PR modifies some tests that fail for distros that have JVMCI or other experimental features enabled-by-default (eg Graal/Truffle distros). These tests are only normally active in releases prior to 23.

I removed 23 from affected versions; these tests skip themselves by default on 23 since March 20 when JDK-8319251 "[REDO] Change LockingMode default from LM_LEGACY to LM_LIGHTWEIGHT" was applied, disabling it.

A pull request was submitted for review.
Branch: master
URL: https://git.openjdk.org/jdk21u-dev/pull/1073
Date: 2024-10-21 22:30:27 +0000
